name: Snack Time with Charlie
description:
A game made in 3 hours for Trijam #142: The 3 hour game jam.

The jam theme is: True or false

You made some cookies to eat with your dog Charlie.
But be careful! Charlie can eat only the white cookies while yours are the chocolate ones!

To play use DRAG the hand Up or Down to eat the cookie.

Art: by me (Sunetraalex)

Music:
"Puppy Song" 
Music by Marcelo Fernández

SFX:
 "7 Eating Crunches" by StarNinjas
